descriptions.description: Build functional software & systems to manage platform infrastructure & applications
Run the production environment by monitoring availability & taking a holistic view of system health of client applications

Consult clients on projects by providing expertise in agile development & user experience strategy across diverse industries with a focus on delivering working software to deliver impactful user experiences
Attend online webinars, & in-person meetups to elevate trending tools, technologies, & leadership skills
Add features to a Next.js & Ruby on Rails application for Discovery, Talk, & Member Pages using TypeScript, React, Tailwind CSS, & Split URL Testing
Improve code quality by adding code coverage tool, provide actionable code reviews, & pair with developers to reduce QA testing to reduce deployment times by 31%
Create & modify accessible modular components to TED UI Design System
Foster team collaboration through the application of agile development methodologies
Build ingestion tool for Kyndryl Sharepoint migration sites from an IBM non-relational database content management system for over 20,000 sites
Develop single page applications using Vue.js & backend microservices using TypeScript, CouchDB, & Node.js
Deliver accessible HTML, JavaScript, & CSS to the client using Vue.js, Vuex, SASS, & TypeScript using webpack
Aggregate legacy APIs, & Cassandra column-family data using GraphQL to feed into Design Library components
Refactor Node.js API microservices for modularity, increasing code coverage up to 85% & over
Create maintainable code with Functional Programming & Test Driven Development
Foster collaboration & user engagement using team chosen agile development methodologies
Participate in hiring & onboarding processes by creating assessments & documentation for 2 additional team members
Deliver HTML, JavaScript, & CSS to components using React, Angular, SASS, & TypeScript from jQuery Soho library based components
Create, measure & modify performance of Infor Design Library components
Develop Python Content Management System for documentation about Infor Design System
Design, develop & demonstrate proof of concept prototypes such as Infor Ming.le Chat
Created Progressive Web Application utilizing NgRX, AWS Lambda, AWS Lex, Infor Coleman AI, & Reactive Programming
